title: Quantitative Evaluation of Dependence among Outputs in ECOC Classifiers Using Mutual Information Based Measures
venue: Universitdi Genova DISI - Dipartimento di Informatica e Scienze dell'Informazione INFM - Istituto Nazionale per la Fisica della Materia

In our experimentation we evaluate this dependence in ECOC monolithic and ECOC PND learning machines. 3.2 The data In our experiments we have used data sets from the UCI repository of Irvine glass letter, optdigits) [11] and a synthetic data set (d5) made up by five threedimensional classes, each composed by two normal distributed disjoint clusters
